story.title: A modern way to honour timeless traditions
story.paragraphOne: MatchUp was created by Sri Lankans who wanted a smarter, kinder way to meet a life partner. Our platform respects family expectations while empowering you to choose a relationship that feels right.
story.paragraphTwo: With guidance available in Sinhala, Tamil, and English, and thoughtful privacy controls, you can explore connections at your own pace.

first.quote: We met on MatchUp while I was in Melbourne and Tharushi was in Galle. The cultural filters helped our families connect instantly.

second.quote: The verification process made me feel safe and respected. Within weeks I found someone who shares my values.

third.quote: MatchUp felt like home—thoughtful, warm, and truly Sri Lankan.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: We are committed to safeguarding your personal data and being transparent about how your information is used across MatchUp.

collection.heading: Information we collect
collection.profile: Account details you share such as your name, contact information, preferences, and any profile photos or descriptions you upload.
collection.usage: Usage data that helps us improve the experience, including how you navigate the product, device information, and crash diagnostics.
collection.interactions: Messages and connection requests you send to other members, which are stored securely so that you can revisit your conversations.

usage.heading: How we use your information
usage.matching: To suggest compatible introductions, highlight nearby members, and tailor discovery filters that are relevant to you.
usage.safety: To maintain a trusted community by verifying profiles, preventing fraud, and responding to reports of unsafe behaviour.
usage.communication: To send essential account notifications and helpful tips about getting the most out of MatchUp. You can adjust your communication preferences at any time.

sharing.heading: When we share data
sharing.partners: We may partner with vetted service providers for secure hosting, analytics, or payment processing. They are bound by strict confidentiality agreements.
sharing.legal: We will disclose information if required to do so by law or to protect the rights, property, or safety of our members, employees, or the public.
sharing.control: We never sell your personal information. You remain in control of what you share on your profile and can request deletion of your data at any time.

choices.heading: Your choices and rights
choices.update: Update your profile details, notification preferences, and visibility controls directly from your account settings.
choices.export: Contact us if you would like a copy of the information we store about you or if you wish to deactivate or delete your account.
choices.support: Have questions? Reach our support team at support@matchup.lk and we will respond within two business days.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: These Terms outline what you can expect from MatchUp and the standards we ask every member to follow.

account.heading: Creating and maintaining your account
account.eligibility: You must be at least 18 years old and legally permitted to enter into a relationship to join MatchUp. You are responsible for maintaining the accuracy of the information you provide.
account.security: Please keep your login credentials confidential. Notify us immediately if you suspect any unauthorised access to your account.

conduct.heading: Community conduct and expectations
conduct.respect: Treat other members with respect and kindness. Harassment, discrimination, or sharing explicit content is strictly prohibited.
conduct.authenticity: You agree to represent yourself honestly. Profiles that impersonate others, contain misleading details, or promote commercial services may be removed.
conduct.safety: Report concerning behaviour directly within the app or by emailing safety@matchup.lk. We review all reports promptly.

payments.heading: Memberships and payments
payments.billing: Paid upgrades renew automatically at the end of each billing cycle unless you cancel before the renewal date. Pricing details are available on our Membership Plans page.
payments.refunds: We do not offer refunds for partially used subscription periods except where required by law. You can manage your plan anytime from account settings.

termination.heading: Suspension or termination
termination.breach: We may suspend or terminate accounts that violate these Terms, harm other members, or compromise the safety of the community.
termination.choice: You may deactivate or delete your account whenever you choose. Removing your account will limit access to your chat history and other saved information.

contact.heading: Questions about these Terms
contact.support: If you have any questions, reach us at hello@matchup.lk and we will be happy to help.

pricing.title: Membership Pricing
pricing.description: Choose the level of support that fits your journey. You can upgrade or downgrade at any time.

faq.heading: Frequently asked questions
faq.billing: Plans renew automatically, and you can switch or cancel anytime from your account. We will send a reminder before each renewal.
faq.support: Need help choosing the right plan? Email premium@matchup.lk and our advisors will guide you.

help.title: Help Centre
help.description: Find answers to common questions and learn how to get the most out of your MatchUp experience.

gettingStarted.heading: Getting started
gettingStarted.profile: Complete your profile with clear photos, a warm introduction, and details about your background. Profiles with more detail receive significantly better responses.
gettingStarted.discovery: Use filters such as language, location, and lifestyle preferences to discover members who align with your goals.

safety.heading: Staying safe
safety.tips: Keep conversations on MatchUp until you feel comfortable sharing personal contact details. Arrange first meetings in public places and let someone you trust know your plans.
safety.report: If you encounter inappropriate behaviour, report it directly from the member profile or email safety@matchup.lk. Our team investigates every report.

support.heading: Need more support?
support.channels: Visit our Support Centre within the app for quick answers, or email support@matchup.lk for personalised assistance.
support.hours: We respond to emails Monday to Friday, 9:00 AM – 6:00 PM Sri Lanka Standard Time.
